Uses of Package
com.cedro.musicplayer

  • Classes in com.cedro.musicplayer used by com.cedro.musicplayer
    Class
    Description
    AllTracksTrackListView
    Class representing the ListView control for the "All tracks" page in the library
    Jukebox
    Singleton class responsible for playing and keeping track of the state of currenty played music.
    LibraryCollectionTile
    Class representing a collection tile with a cover and a name displayed in "Albums" and "User collections" sections
    MusicAlbum
    A class representing a music album.
    MusicCollection
    Class representing a collection of music tracks.
    MusicDatabase
    A class that stores all tracks, albums and user collections
    MusicTrack
    Class representing a music track
    PlaylistTrackListView
    ListView class for the paylist
    TrackListView
    Abstract class for the ListView that displays music tracks.
